      • startMonitor

        public void startMonitor(int periodMicroSeconds,
                ThresholdListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: AnalogInput
        Start a monitor on the analog input. It will check the value on the analog input periodically, as specified with the periodMicroSeconds argument. When the threshold has been reached the listener's thresholdReached method will be called.
        Specified by:
        startMonitor in interface AnalogInput
        Parameters:
        periodMicroSeconds - the period micro seconds
        listener - the listener

      • stopMonitor

        public void stopMonitor()
        Description copied from interface: AnalogInput
        Stops the monitor that currently listens on the pin.
        Specified by:
        stopMonitor in interface AnalogInput
